# MFGbuddy (Official Site)
# https://mfgbuddy.com/

## Summary
MFGbuddy is an AI consulting agency based in Pune, India, delivering on-site in Pune and remotely across India and globally. We help businesses identify high-ROI AI opportunities, run measurable Proof of Value pilots, and support production implementation with governance, approvals, and monitoring.

## Services
- AI Fitment Audit (5 days): workflow mapping, ROI sizing, data readiness, governance checklist, prioritized roadmap, and a small demo using sample/anonymized data.
- Proof of Value (2–6 weeks): pilot connected to real workflow, KPI baseline, user validation, and before/after impact measurement.
- Implementation & Support: integrations, role-based access control, audit logs, human approvals, monitoring, training, and rollout support.
- AI Bootcamps & Coaching: practical AI training for leaders, teams, and engineers focused on workflows, ROI, governance, and adoption.

## Typical AI Opportunities
- Triage and routing (email, tickets, WhatsApp)
- Assisted drafting and follow-ups
- Meeting/call summaries and action items
- Knowledge search across SOPs, policies, and manuals
- Document extraction (invoices, purchase orders, forms)
- Validation checks and approval support
- Reporting, analytics, anomaly detection, and forecasting

## Delivery Model
- Based in Pune, Maharashtra, India
- On-site delivery in Pune (when needed)
- Remote delivery across India and globally
- ROI-first approach: Audit → Proof of Value → Deploy
